title: iPad Air 4 models now available on the Apple Refurbished Store
content:
Apple on Monday began selling the iPad Air 4, also known as the 2020 iPad Air, in its US Refurbished Store. There, customers can get the previous generation iPad Air for a lower price, which is great for those who don’t need everything the latest iPad Air offers.

more…

The post iPad Air 4 models now available on the Apple Refurbished Store appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple began selling iPad Air 4 in its US Refurbished Store. Customers can get it for a lower price compared to a brand-new iPad Air 5.
